Cell counts per cluster

Source: R/cellCountsPerCluster-methods.R
cellCountsPerCluster.Rd

Cell counts per cluster

# S4 method for SingleCellExperiment
cellCountsPerCluster(object,
  interestingGroups = NULL)

# S4 method for seurat
cellCountsPerCluster(object, interestingGroups = NULL)

Arguments

object

Object.
interestingGroups

character. Groups of interest that define the samples. If left unset, defaults to sampleName.

Value

tbl_df. Grouped by ident column and arranged by n.

Examples

data(seurat_small)
x <- cellCountsPerCluster(seurat_small)
print(x)
#> # A tibble: 4 x 3
#> # Groups:   ident [4]
#>   ident     n ratio
#>   <fct> <int> <dbl>
#> 1 0        29     1
#> 2 1        29     1
#> 3 2        12     1
#> 4 3        10     1
